Message:
Bonds are the very thing
that give us humans strength.
As the wielder of the Staff,
I’m sure you know that
even better than I do though.

My friends and I have been
together ever since we were kids,
and all endured the same
rigorous training.

We all came from
different backgrounds,
but we were as close as family.

Elaine the nun in particular
was my closest friend,
and the most like a sister to me.

Since we slept in the same bed,
we’d always stay up till morning
talking to each other.

About God, where we came from,
and of course, a sleepover must—
moonlit talks about love!

Though when we overslept
and missed training,
Artoria may have gotten
a teensy bit angry with us...

But, even though
the Heroes were never
involved in our antics,
they’d always brave her
super long-winded lectures
right alongside us.

We were more like a family than
any real family could ever be,
and practically spent
every waking moment together!

We did go our separate ways
when it was time to
take a bath though, of course!
